c:attribute.name: alertState
c:attribute.description: The current state of this alert.

c:attribute.name: devices
c:attribute.description: The addresses of all the devices that are able to participate in this alarm.

c:attribute.name: excludedDevices
c:attribute.description: The addresses of the devices that are excluded from participating in this alarm.

c:attribute.name: activeDevices
c:attribute.description: The addresses of the devices that are participating in this alarm.

c:attribute.name: offlineDevices
c:attribute.description: The addresses of the devices would be active except they have fallen offline.

c:attribute.name: triggeredDevices
c:attribute.description: The addresses of the devices which are currently triggered.

c:attribute.name: triggers
c:attribute.description: The triggers associated with the current alert.

c:attribute.name: monitored
c:attribute.description: True if this alarm is professionally monitored.

c:attribute.name: silent
c:attribute.description: When true only notifications will be sent, alert devices / keypads will not sound.
